org.jfree.chart.annotations

Interface XYAnnotation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XYDrawableAnnotation, XYImageAnnotation, XYLineAnnotation, XYPointerAnnotation, XYShapeAnnotation, XYTextAnnotation

    public interface XYAnnotation
    The interface that must be supported by annotations that are to be added to an XYPlot.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2, XYPlot plot, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D dataArea, ValueAxis domainAxis, ValueAxis rangeAxis)
      Draws the annotation.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
          XYPlot plot,
          java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D dataArea,
          ValueAxis domainAxis,
          ValueAxis rangeAxis)
        Draws the annotation.
        Parameters:
        g2 - the graphics device.
        plot - the plot.
        dataArea - the data area.
        domainAxis - the domain axis.
        rangeAxis - the range axis.
